item.title: Big Tech companies, foreign governments scramble after Trump slaps $100,000 fee on H-1B visas
item.description: The announcement to impose a $100,000 annual fee on H-1B visas sent shockwaves through corporate America.

item.title: From shopping carts to superchips: Alibaba rediscovers edge with bold billion-dollar AI pivot
item.description: Once best known for e-commerce, Alibaba this month has ramped up its AI investments across robotics and related businesses.

item.title: Kevin Durant has access restored to his Coinbase bitcoin account, after years of being locked out
item.description: Kevin Durant has regained access to his Coinbase account containing bitcoins.

item.title: NBA star Kevin Durant can't unlock his Coinbase bitcoin account. His agent is thrilled
item.description: Houston Rockets star forward Kevin Durant can't access his Coinbase account or the bitcoin held there. His agent says that's a good thing.

item.title: Fed's Kashkari advocates two more rate cuts this year as he sees limited tariff impact on inflation
item.description: Minneapolis Federal Reserve President Neel Kashkari spoke Friday on CNBC's "Squawk Box."
